subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: In 10 seconds on Sunday night, the N.B.A. finals bounced between two truths, the ones that Coach Pat Riley once coined as winning and misery. Riley's Heat has a 3-2 series edge heading into tonight's game in Dallas.
snippet: In 10 seconds on Sunday night, the N.B.A. finals bounced between two truths, the ones that Coach Pat Riley once coined as winning and misery. Riley's Heat has a 3-2 series edge heading into tonight's game in Dallas.
